EventType@Redfish.AllowableValues.description: This is the type of event to be added.
EventType@Redfish.AllowableValues.longDescription: This defines the property name for which the following allowable values apply.

EventId@Redfish.AllowableValues.description: This is the ID of event to be added.
EventId@Redfish.AllowableValues.longDescription: This property has the same semantics as the EventId property in the Event schema for Redfish.

EventTimestamp@Redfish.AllowableValues.description: This is the time stamp of event to be added.
EventTimestamp@Redfish.AllowableValues.longDescription: This property has the same semantics as the EventId property in the Event schema for Redfish.

Severity@Redfish.AllowableValues.description: This is the Severity of event to be added.
Severity@Redfish.AllowableValues.longDescription: This property has the same semantics as the Severity property in the Event schema for Redfish.

Message@Redfish.AllowableValues.description: This is the human readable message of event to be added.
Message@Redfish.AllowableValues.longDescription: This property has the same semantics as the Message property in the Event schema for Redfish.

MessageId@Redfish.AllowableValues.description: This is the message ID of event to be added.
MessageId@Redfish.AllowableValues.longDescription: This property has the same semantics as the MessageId property in the Event schema for Redfish.

MessageArgs@Redfish.AllowableValues.description: This is the array of message arguments of the event to be added.
MessageArgs@Redfish.AllowableValues.longDescription: This property has the same semantics as the MessageArgs property in the Event schema for Redfish.

OriginOfCondition@Redfish.AllowableValue.description: This is the OriginOfCondition property of event to be added.
OriginOfCondition@Redfish.AllowableValue.longDescription: This property has the same semantics as the OriginOfCondition property in the Event schema for Redfish.
